title: Bajaj Finance Ltd drops for fifth straight session - Business Standard
content: Bajaj Finance Ltd drops for fifth straight session  Business Standard
description: Bajaj Finance Ltd is quoting at Rs 6029.95, down 4.43% on the day as on 13:19 IST on the NSE. The stock jumped 9.76% in last one year as compared to a 10.4% rally in NIFTY and a 0.57% spurt in the Nifty Financial Services index.
